glsa.title: MPlayer: Two buffer overflows
glsa.synopsis: Two vulnerabilities have been discovered in MPlayer, each one could lead to the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: MPlayer is a media player incuding support for a wide range of audio and video formats.

description.p: A buffer overflow has been reported in the DMO_VideoDecoder_Open() function in file loader/dmo/DMO_VideoDecoder.c. Another buffer overflow has been reported in the DS_VideoDecoder_Open() function in file loader/dshow/DS_VideoDecoder.c.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted video file, potentially resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running MPlayer.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
